title: Youngest Little Typophile
content:
Hello all,

Just wanted to share with you the newest and youngest Typophile. My wife and I just had our first baby the other day. Below is the announcement of his birth.

Regards,  
Ray

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704193301im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/itsaboy_4214.png)

 [‹ Impossible to get Adrian Frutiger's "Type, Sign, Symbol"](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704193301/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44739 "Go to previous forum topic") [JLT on NPR ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704193301/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44743 "Go to next forum topic")
author: microspective

comments.content: Congratulations! Cute little tittle of a nose!

Congrats!

Tis the season for new kids. A close webhead buddy of mine just had his first too. the tykes a mini-Typophile too, whom particularly enjoys Fedra Serif.

Congratulations. Your life has now changed completely. I’m so happy for you and your wife and son. Love the announcement!

Sharon
Cute kid, cool blankies!

Enjoy these years. They will be the best of your life.

Congrats to all of you!

ChrisL
Congratulations! What a cutie!

Congratulations.  
Hooray for babies.

Dav
Congratulations! He’s really cute.
Beautiful!

Whooo Hooo!

Awww, check out the little papa hair do- he has baby’s widows peak too.

I wish you all the best.

Mikey :-)

Great Graphics too.

:-)

Hooray!

Congratulations!

_«El futuro es una línea tan fina que apenas nos damos cuenta de pintarla nosotros mismos». (La Luz Oscura, por Javier Guerrero)_
Congratulations!
Congrats!

Congratulations! All and everything will change (our twins arrived in Oct. 06), but that is not a bad thing sometimes. Fresh air!

All the best, T.

BTW What is the slab you’ve choosen?
Congratulations!! God Save the Baby! :-)

Awwww! What a cutie!

(da wittuh ear aw aw aw aw - ahem.)

—-  
eeblet.com
Congratulations!!
Congrats! He is adorable.
Nicely done. Congratulations.

Next year, One more Kingstone?!  
Like Father, Like Son.  
Typophile! Have Fun.

Congratulations! What a lovely way to share a lovely baby’s birth. Now you have become the Kingston Trio. It is the name of a band that was popular half a century ago; so next Christmas you can sing baby the seasonal lullaby “Goodnight My Baby” song this group! [http://www.lyrics007.com/print.php?id=TWpnNU9EazU](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704193301/http:/www.lyrics007.com/print.php?id=TWpnNU9EazU "http://www.lyrics007.com/print.php?id=TWpnNU9EazU")  
PS Hello Aziz glad to meet you here!

Congratulations! Here’s to a big family, with many weights.

Our own typophile isn’t too too far behind herself.
Thanks all. Congrats to you, too, Eric. Good luck!
